name: Lost Pages
description:
Lost Pages is a small game I did for the Js13k Games 2020 competition. The theme for the competition was the HTML code 404. The game has it flaws but I fixed some bugs present in the JS13K upload (The biggest one was that animations were not playing properly). 

The game is about a librarian that finds a weird book in the library where she works. She grabs this book and suddenly is transported to another world. She now wields a scepter instead of the book and she must find all the book's pages to return to her world.

Controls

Arrows - Move the character

X - Attack

Z - Jump

Programming and pixel art Ragnatic

Art adviser CarolRiverArt
